case_title: ABDUL REHMAN vs PROVINCIAL TRANSPORT AUTHORITY, BALOCHISTAN through Chairman and 3 others
respondents: Provincial Transport Authority, Balochistan through Chairman

facts.route_permit_granted: Pishin to Rod Mullazia via Khanozai
facts.challenge_basis: Route not classified under Rule-57-A of Motor Vehicle Rules, 1969

legal_points.rule_57_a: Classification of routes for stage-carriage permits
legal_points.article_18: Constitution of Islamic Republic of Pakistan, 1973 - Right to lawful business or trade

judgment_summary.respondent_no_4_locus_standi: No locus standi to challenge permit
judgment_summary.classification_requirement: No penal consequences for unclassified route
judgment_summary.permit_restoration: Permit restored by District Transport Authority
judgment_summary.directive: Competent authority to classify the route
